original_title: Official Scary Parodies 2: Killer Fucking Compilations
overview: Get scared and off at the same time!  Dare to return to the scariest, sexiest compilation in XXX! This sequel is bursting with gore and loaded with lust, and full of handpicked scenes from six of your favorite official horror and thriller parodies! From the pure evil thrills of Michael Myers in Halloween to the bloodcurdling sicko seductions in The Silence of the Lambs. Each piece of unforgettable action will leave you terrified and titillated at the same time!
title: Official Scary Parodies 2: Killer Fucking Compilations
